posts.post_content: Decided to attempt to get my Mathewson collection back off the ground these days.  I have this Griffith and a few others (once I decide which ones) that I can trade to help grab some more Mattys for my collection.  If interested shoot me an email or PM.
Since no trade options have shown up yet for Mattys, I would also be willing to sell it so that I could fund some Matty buys.  Feel free to shoot me an offer if you want.
